sentence.Network_en: Robertson was a doer, not a thinker.
sentence.Network_cn: 罗伯逊是位实干家，不是空想家。

sentence.Network_en: Bad deeds , as well as good, may rebound upon the doer.
sentence.Network_cn: 善有善报, 恶有恶报.

sentence.Network_en: She was a fusion of the dreamer and doer.
sentence.Network_cn: 她是空想者和实干者的结合.

创业应该具备的基本素质_百度知道 ... ② 果断（ Decisiveness） ③ 实干（ Doers） ④ 决心（ Determination）.

你要记住，我是行为者（Doer）。这意味着什么？

list.abs: a real doer in party politics ., 一个政党的真正活跃分子.
Eventually all the evil doers get their just reward ., 所有做恶的人最终都会得到他们应得的报应.
the bold talker is not always the greatest doer .最大胆的空谈家不总是最伟大的实干家。
chart with differences @ 基督徒 :: 痞客邦... ... Sick,wounded 病, 伤痛 Guilty,evil doer 有罪的,为恶者 Saint 圣徒.

entry.def: If you refer to someone as a doer, you mean that they do jobs promptly and efficiently, without spending a lot of time thinking about them.

example.ex: Robertson was a doer, not a thinker.
example.tran: 罗伯逊是位实干家,不是空想家。

means.word_mean: 1. a person who acts and gets things done;

sentences.sentence: "he's a principal actor in this affair"
"when you want something done get a doer"
